title: File a Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) Request
description: A journalist needs to obtain government records about a public contract and must file a formal FOIA request.

tasks.description: Identify the correct government agency and specific office responsible for handling the requested records.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the target agency for the FOIA request.

tasks.description: Draft a FOIA request letter that clearly and specifically describes the records being sought, citing the relevant contract numbers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts a legally sound and specific request to prevent rejection.

tasks.description: Submit the request through the agency's official portal and set a calendar reminder to follow up if no response is received within the statutory time limit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the request and creates a follow-up task.
